epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement user authentication and authorization with multi-factor authentication.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication system that allows users to log in using multi-factor authentication. Incorporate role-based access control to ensure users can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
epics.description: Design and implement a personalized dashboard that shows users available banking products and services based on their profile and eligibility. Ensure the dashboard is user-friendly and provides easy navigation.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Develop workflows for account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Implement streamlined workflows that allow users to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. Ensure users receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding their submitted requests.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Create a responsive design for seamless access across devices.
epics.description: Ensure the portal is fully responsive and provides a consistent user experience across various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones.

epics.title: Data Security and Interaction History
epics.summary: Implement data security measures and maintain an interaction history.
epics.description: Ensure the security of sensitive financial data and maintain a comprehensive history of all user interactions. Implement necessary encryption and security protocols to protect user data.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's existing core banking system.
epics.description: Develop the necessary integration with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining a separate database for optimal performance and reliability. Ensure seamless data exchange between systems.

epics.title: Save and Resume Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and resume incomplete applications.
epics.description: Implement functionality that allows users to save incomplete applications and return to them later. Ensure users can upload necessary documentation directly through the interface.

user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to authenticate using multi-factor authentication, so that my account is more secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include options for SMS, email, and authenticator apps.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can choose their preferred method of multi-factor authentication.
2. The system prompts users for a second authentication factor after password entry.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user has entered their password, When they select SMS as the authentication method, Then the system sends an SMS with a verification code.

user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to assign roles to users, so that they can only access services appropriate to their authorization level.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure roles include admin, user, and guest.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Administrators can assign roles to users.
2. Users can only access services that match their role.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has the 'user' role, When they try to access admin services, Then the system denies access.

user_stories.title: Implement Secure Authentication System
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a secure authentication system, so that my login credentials are protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use encryption for storing passwords and sensitive data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Passwords are hashed before storage.
2. The system uses HTTPS for all authentication operations.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the user has entered their credentials, When they log in, Then the credentials are securely transmitted and verified.

user_stories.title: Display Relevant Banking Products
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to see banking products relevant to my profile, so that I can easily find services I am eligible for.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Match products based on user's profile and eligibility.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Relevant products are displayed based on user profile.
2. Users are notified of new eligible products.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user logs in, When their profile is checked, Then the dashboard displays relevant products.

user_stories.title: Provide Easy Navigation
user_stories.description: As a user, I want easy navigation on the dashboard, so that I can quickly find the services I need.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the dashboard has a clean layout with intuitive menus.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard includes clear navigation options.
2. Users can access services within three clicks.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is on the dashboard, When they look for a service, Then they can find it within three clicks.

user_stories.title: User-Friendly Dashboard Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a user-friendly dashboard design, so that my experience is smooth and efficient.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include elements such as tooltips, icons, and responsive elements.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The dashboard design is visually appealing and functional.
2. Users can easily interact with all elements.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the dashboard, When they interact with elements, Then all elements respond as expected.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Streamlined Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a prospective customer, I want a streamlined account opening workflow, so that I can open an account with minimal clicks.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Simplify the forms and reduce the number of steps required.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The account opening form is simple and concise.
2. Users can submit the account opening request in less than five minutes.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user starts the account opening process, When they fill out the form, Then they can complete it within five minutes.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Real-Time Status Updates
user_stories.description: As a user, I want real-time status updates on my account opening request, so that I know the progress of my application.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate real-time updates and notifications.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users receive updates on the status of their requests.
2. Notifications are sent via email and user dashboard.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has submitted a request, When the status changes, Then they are notified in real-time.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a simple service modification workflow, so that I can update my services with minimal effort.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure users can request service changes with minimal clicks.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The service modification process is intuitive.
2. Users receive confirmations of their modifications.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user wants to modify a service, When they submit a request, Then the process is simple and confirmed.

user_stories.title: Ensure Consistent User Experience
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a consistent experience across devices, so that I can use the service seamlessly from any device.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure the design adapts to desktops, tablets, and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal design adapts to different screen sizes.
2. Users have a consistent experience on all devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on different devices, When the screen size changes, Then the layout adapts appropriately.

user_stories.title: Implement Mobile-Friendly Elements
user_stories.description: As a mobile user, I want mobile-friendly elements, so that I can easily interact with the portal on my phone.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include touch-friendly elements and responsive images.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All elements are touch-friendly.
2. Images and text are readable on mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user accesses the portal on a mobile device, When they interact with elements, Then the elements respond to touch inputs.

user_stories.title: Consistent Navigation Across Devices
user_stories.description: As a user, I want navigation to be consistent across devices, so that I can easily find information everywhere.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Maintain similar menu structures and options across devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The navigation structure is consistent on different devices.
2. Users can easily find the same information on any device.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user switches from one device to another, When they look for a specific menu, Then the menu structure remains consistent.

user_stories.title: Implement Data Encryption
user_stories.description: As a user, I want my financial data to be encrypted, so that it is protected from unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use industry-standard encryption protocols.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All sensitive data is encrypted at rest and in transit.
2. Unauthorized access attempts are logged.
user_stories.test_cases: Given financial data is stored, When it is accessed, Then it is encrypted and secure.

user_stories.title: Maintain Interaction History
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want a history of user interactions, so that I can audit and review user activities.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Record all user interactions and provide audit logs.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. All user actions are logged.
2. Administrators can access and review interaction logs.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user performs an action, When it is recorded, Then the interaction history is maintained.

user_stories.title: Implement Security Protocols
user_stories.description: As an IT administrator, I want to implement security protocols, so that the system remains secure from threats.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include multi-layer security measures and regular audits.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Security protocols are deployed and tested.
2. Regular security audits are conducted.
user_stories.test_cases: Given security protocols are in place, When an audit is conducted, Then no vulnerabilities are found.

user_stories.title: Develop Integration with Core Banking System
user_stories.description: As an integration developer, I want to integrate the portal with the existing core banking system, so that data can be exchanged seamlessly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use secure APIs for integration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data exchanges between the portal and core system are seamless.
2. The integration does not affect performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal and core system are connected, When data is exchanged, Then it is transferred without errors.

user_stories.title: Maintain Separate Database
user_stories.description: As a database administrator, I want to maintain a separate database for the portal, so that performance and reliability are optimized.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure data consistency and integrity across systems.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. The portal has its dedicated database.
2. The separate database improves performance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the portal has a separate database, When data is queried, Then performance is optimized and data remains consistent.

user_stories.title: Ensure Reliable Data Exchange
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to ensure reliable data exchange between systems, so that data integrity is maintained.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Use reliable message queues and data validation.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Data exchange processes are reliable and accurate.
2. Any data exchange issues are logged and rectified promptly.
user_stories.test_cases: Given systems are exchanging data, When an error occurs, Then it is logged and addressed without affecting overall reliability.

user_stories.title: Allow Users to Save Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to save my incomplete applications, so that I can resume them later.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Provide a save option for every step of the application process.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can save partially completed applications.
2. Saved applications can be resumed from the point they were left.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is filling out an application, When they click save, Then their progress is saved and can be resumed later.

user_stories.title: Upload Documentation Directly
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface, so that my application process is more convenient.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Include an option to upload documents at any application step.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users can upload documents during application.
2. Uploaded documents are securely stored and associated with the application.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user is at any step of the application, When they upload a document, Then the document is stored and associated correctly.

user_stories.title: Notify Users of Incomplete Applications
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be notified of my incomplete applications, so that I can complete them in a timely manner.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Send notifications through email and user dashboard.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria:
1. Users are notified of any incomplete applications.
2. Notifications include links to resume the application process.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user has an incomplete application, When the notification is sent, Then it includes a link to resume the application.

architecture_generation.description: Architecture for a user-friendly self-service banking portal using Azure. The portal includes a web application, API management, secure authentication, scalable storage solutions, serverless backend processing, automated workflows, real-time notifications, secure access and compliance management, and continuous monitoring.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address security, reliability, performance efficiency, and cost optimization gaps. New nodes for Azure Security Center, Azure Backup, Azure Site Recovery, Azure Cache for Redis, and Azure Cost Management have been added. The architecture now aligns better with Azure Well-Architected Framework principles, ensuring a robust, secure, and efficient system.
